overview: In 1910, the landlord's daughter Agnes from the Steiermark gets to know the diplomat Hans.  They have a short love affair and then part from one another.  Hans gets sent to Beijing, where he marries and American and has a son with her.  Agnes, too, has a son by Hans and moves to Vienna, where she works  in a restaurant.  She is still in love with Hans ...
title: Ein Leben lang
